name: Canis Majoris The Truthful
description:
Who is Canis Majoris?

He's a demon that will fufill your curiosity by turning the red pointer on the compas to yes or no.

Don't abuse his power though, you might make him angry, and when that happens, death is certain.

How to play?

Enter a question that can be answered with yes-no, and shake your device to get an answer, on your computer you can click the compass.
